meanings.definition: A group of RNA viruses that cause respiratory infections in humans and animals.
meanings.sent1: Coronaviruses can spread through the air when someone coughs or sneezes.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying coronaviruses to develop vaccines against them.
meanings.sent3: The coronaviruses at the party seemed to be having a contagious dance-off.
meanings.sent4: The impact of coronaviruses on global health is like a storm brewing in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The image of coronaviruses attacking cells is like tiny invaders in a microscopic battlefield.

meanings.sent1: There are many coronaviruses circulating around the world.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are researching different coronaviruses to understand their variations.
meanings.sent3: The coronaviruses in the zoo were having a meeting about their name.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of illnesses, coronaviruses stand out like a school of fish in a pond.
meanings.sent5: The sight of coronaviruses under a microscope is like a galaxy of tiny stars.
